name: thedailybeast
text:
EXCLUSIVE: For three decades, Kathy Griffin made her living as a comedian. “Now I’m a professional defendant,” she says.

Griffin has spent much of the past two years embroiled in two lawsuits involving students from Covington Catholic High School. https://t.co/TVvc0NLp2i

name: thedailybeast
text:
When Griffin found out that the federal judge on the case was 84-year-old William Bertelsman, she says she was “shitting bricks.”

“He was appointed by my boyfriend Jimmy Carter,” Griffin says, “but still I’m like, ugh, 84 and in Kentucky.” https://t.co/cq4qTsQju4

name: thedailybeast
text:
Luckily for her, Bertelsman rejected the argument in the suit. 

Three months later, the plaintiffs filed a notice of appeal and a hearing is scheduled for January 2021 in the 6th Circuit Court of Appeals. https://t.co/cq4qTsQju4

name: thedailybeast
text:
If two or three of the judges were appointed by Trump, "I’m going to be very, very nervous,” Griffin says, adding, “I’m not a terrorist, pass it on.”

Read the exclusive by @mattwilstein and @pbmelendez on comedian @kathygriffin's legal nightmare here: https://t.co/cq4qTsQju4

name: thedailybeast
text:
RT @mattwilstein: Talked to @kathygriffin about the legal nightmare that has taken over her life over the last few years. 

Trump may be on his way out, but it’s not over yet.

 https://t.co/rR0EgL0ox0

name: thedailybeast
text: RT @kathygriffin: Not sure if you guys have known about this. I don’t feel I should have to be quiet about it anymore. https://t.co/DYyqfE7AGf

name: thedailybeast
text: President-elect Joe Biden’s transition team has been blocked from meeting with leaders of U.S. intelligence agencies after the Trump administration rejected numerous requests https://t.co/eUq6sTNTcN

name: thedailybeast
text: “I originally thought that it was a cool art project or a prank from 4chan when the first one showed up,” one YouTuber told The Daily Beast. After the appearance of the Romanian monolith, however, he began to suspect an advertising stunt. https://t.co/enPFGFA72X
